title: [BUG] Game Crash w/ Hextech Crafting
body: Sometimes when you're in queue or in anything the game will crash when you try to open Hextech Crafting.

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up on this!  We've received reports on this and looking into it.  It doesn't seem to happen every time, but there may be an issue where the client could crash if you open hextech crafting while in queue.  To investigate further, what kind of error are you receiving?

The game just completely shuts down. Upon trying to reopen it you will be prompted with the "An instance of League is running would you like to terminate it?" or something along those lines. Afterwards that's it and you can log in and everything.
Exactly! I'm having the same problem across multiple PC's, and accounts. It usually never happens after I first open the client, but periodically happens during and after games.
